title: Patching Failure
body: Whenever i click on league and start it, it says "We have restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends. Now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version." and then when i press okay it says "There was a problem patching League of Legends. We'll restore a backup version and try updating again after you restart the patcher." Then its just an endless loop of that. I've the hextech repair tool and still doesn't work. Is there a way to fix this?

replies.body: im having the same problem any help wpuld be fantastic

Hi xXHypnoZeeXx! It would be a huge help if you could provide your League Client logs:

- Go to "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\LeagueClient Logs\"
- Select the latest "LeagueClient.log" file
- Open it using notepad or a similar program
- Select everything (ctrl + A) and copy it
- Go to pastebin.com and paste the content there
- Set the expiration date to 1 week
- Submit it
- Share the link here

In the meantime, you might have some luck running LeagueClient.exe as administrator. Give that a shot!
